tasks.task: Winter pruning of fruit trees and vines.
subtasks: Identify the type of pruning (winter vs. summer) and its timing.
Assess the impact of winter pruning on tree vigor.
Evaluate different methods of pruning for fruit tree density and growth control.
Prune cherry trees to achieve a desired form, focusing on lower branching.
Explain the importance of espalier pruning techniques for home gardeners.
Demonstrate summer pruning practices to control fruit tree size and promote fruiting.
Discuss pruning considerations for grapevines, including the timing and method.
Detail the pruning process for stone fruits (apricots, plums), including removing lanky shoots and managing fruit buds.
Demonstrate how pruning affects the next season's growth and fruit production.
Address the consequences of previous pruning mistakes and demonstrate corrective measures.
